front.title: Neighbor Vehicle Discovery and Service in IP-Based Vehicular Networks

abstract.t: For Cooperative Adaptive Cruise Control (C-ACC), platooning and other typical use cases in ITS, direct IP communication between neighbor vehicles poses the following two issues: 1) how to discover a neighbor vehicle and the demanded service; and 2) how to discover the link-layer address of the neighbor vehicle and selected server. This document presents a solution to these problems based on DNS-SD/mDNS [RFC6762][RFC6763].
